definition: the right of immunity from arrest afforded by the Taiwan ROC Constitution, for the duration of meetings, unless caught actually committing a crime, to members of the National Assembly, the Legislative Yuan, or a supervisory committee

sentences.english: This month Iran arrested several more bloggers.
sentences.chinese: 本月伊朗又逮捕了多名博主。

sentences.english: In the arms of a suspect was arrested near the burial.
sentences.chinese: 一可疑人物在武器埋藏地附近被逮捕。

sentences.english: I went to arrest Goebbels, taking a Leutnant and a squad of men with me.
sentences.chinese: 我帶着少尉和一小隊人去逮捕戈培爾。

sentences.english: When a public security organ demands the arrest of an offender, it shall obtain the approval of a people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關要求逮捕人犯的時候，由人民檢察院批准。

sentences.english: Twenty years ago roughly ten boys were arrested for assault for every one girl.
sentences.chinese: 二十年前，只有大約十個男孩因毆打一個女孩被逮捕。

sentences.english: The warrant once granted, your will of course directed everything.
sentences.chinese: 逮捕令一旦批了下來，你的意志當然就主宰一切了。

sentences.english: I wish they would leave us alone and go and arrest some muggers instead.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他們別管我們，去逮捕那些行兇搶劫者。

sentences.english: However this year the police have vowed to arrest them for indecent exposure.
sentences.chinese: 然而，今年警方宣誓以不恰當暴露罪逮捕他們。

sentences.english: But Nunez says drug smugglers are not always easy to catch.
sentences.chinese: 但弩內茲還表示，逮捕毒販一直有其難度。

sentences.english: Over a nine-month period, nine Bengals have been arrested.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的九個月間，孟加拉虎隊有九名隊員遭到逮捕。

sentences.english: Teng Biao, a lecturer at China University of Political Science and Law, was arrested the same afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 中國政法大學講師滕彪當天下午也被逮捕。

sentences.english: The suspect who fled was arrested on suspicion of being drunk in public and resisting arrest.
sentences.chinese: 逃走的那名嫌犯因涉嫌公然酗酒及拒捕而遭到逮捕。

sentences.english: On Thursday, the authorities caught one of the fishmongers.
sentences.chinese: 週二，當局逮捕了其中的一個魚販子。

sentences.english: At present, the suspicion of intentional homicide, Chen has been approved by the prosecution to arrest.
sentences.chinese: 目前，因涉嫌故意殺人罪，陳某已被檢方批准逮捕。

sentences.english: Europol said more than 100 people had been arrested in coordinated raids across 10 countries.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲刑警組織稱與10個國家協作逮捕了100多人。

definition: on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
in custody/to keep sb in detention
